summary.p: Converts a given value to a 64-bit unsigned integer.

examples.p: The following shows TO_UINT64 results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_UINT64 result of value ''1'' is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT64('1') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_UINT64 result of value 800000000000.999 is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT64(800000000000.999) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_UINT64 result of value 800000000001.999 is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT64(800000000001.999) AS Value
